text: Hey! Sorry in my delay in replying! We're switching over to Linux at work, and without a working PC at home, I've not been able to check this yet. That does make sense, So you would be using something like (if i@group_wood* == 1 } do this {) sort of thing?

Could you create a group via group expression. And say something along the lines of * wood * == 1 and make it? Without Houdini infront of me at the moment I can't check. I'll try and check at work Monday and see if slack gets unblocked and let you know, otherwise I'll have a play around and tr and get on here at home. If you haven't already solved it?

Or something like this: <https://forums.odforce.net/topic/21689-how-to-spell-piece-in-attribwrangle-vex/>
If you haven't tried already?
